description: Tuleap is an Open Source Suite to improve management of software developments and collaboration. An attacker could use a cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Tuleap Community Edition prior to version 16.8.99.1749830289 and Tuleap Enterprise Edition prior to version 16.9-1 to trick victims into changing the canned responses. Tuleap Community Edition 16.8.99.1749830289 and Tuleap Enterprise Edition 16.9-1 contain a patch for the issue.
